step_data.thought:
I've searched for 'Fitness Tracker Pro' and the search has been executed. I can now see the product in the results table. To update the inventory threshold, I need to:

1. Edit the product by clicking on the 'Edit Fitness Tracker Pro' link
2. Navigate to the Advanced Inventory settings
3. Update the 'Notify for Quantity Below' threshold to 10

I can see the 'Edit Fitness Tracker Pro' link in the last column of the table (bid 2240). I'll click this link to open the product editing page.
